Reviews.Title: LOVE THE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Waine
Reviews.Content: I got the Canon 60D with 16gig, two lenses were 18-55mm IS and  55-250mm IS. Accessories were as follows: Screen Protector, Cleaning Kit, Card Reader, Tripod, Camera Bag and Wallet for SD card.First let me talk about what i like:1. Camera is great, genuine Canon 60D2. Lens are perfect3. Shipping was very fast, ordered it on a Thursday evening and got it Monday of the following week (less than two business days). Free shipping. It arrived at least two days before the slotted time.4. Extra Battery was a wonderful surprise, so if you are thinking of buying a battery grip there is already two batteries made available.5. The Protective Screen is nice as wellThings that were disappointing:1. The BAG is awful, looks nothing like picture, so don't use the picture to determine the bag you will get. The bag has basically no padding. I put the camera and lens in the bag and it just moved around in the bag. The lens were hitting on each other and hitting on the camera. No side pockets, No front Pockets, just one big compartment to push everything in. A school bag is better than the bag. BAG WAS VERY VERY LOW IN QUALITY.2. The tripod isn't very strong either, for such an expensive camera, i am already afraid to use the tripod.So when you make this purchase, don't expect a good camera bag or tripod. Everything else is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great Startup Bundle
Reviews.Author: JeMichael
Reviews.Content: Great Customer service From This Company and Great bundle (great startup package- for anyone that wants to know the sd card is a class 6)... Came packaged very well... I would recommend this package to anyone

Reviews.Title: Im little disapointed
Reviews.Author: Mauricio
Reviews.Content: Well... the Canon 60D is a good camera, no more coments about it. The cheap tripod and awful bag, i've already awarning by others reviews of this item. No problem. But, the camera came in a not original box, the lenses wraped in plastic, none of the batteries was genuine canon. At first i thik it was refurbished, i got to count the number of shutters, finally wasnt, but i was really scare. Asking about that before you purchase.

Reviews.Title: So far very good...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera itself was a given.  What was nice about this kit is everything that it came with for near the same price as the Camera & Lenses alone.  All the little things.  Especially the cables & memory card.The camera itself is an upgrade from an old Canon EOS A2E.  I already have EF lenses.  All the lenses work great.  The options on the camera are near endless.  As a professionally trained photographer this camera looks to be an excellent tool.

Reviews.Title: Love the whole package!
Reviews.Author: DN
Reviews.Content: The camera and package was the price the camera was at Best Buy for just the body.  The camera and package came quickly and had great items!  We love using the camera and feel like we got a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Such an amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: macyallyn
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for some upcoming photography classes. I was advised to go with a smaller camera, but have had my heart set on this one since I started seeing it in different photography magazines.I got to really test it out at the Detroit Auto Show on January 22, 2011 and my photos turned out really crisp and clear. The tilt LCD screen really helped out too. I have a really awesome photo of the injection stacks on top of a racing engine that I had to use the tilt screen for. Talk about an awesome feature.The entire package is really great and has almost everything I need to start my classes. I've even recommended a similar package to a classmate!I love it and look forward to learning more about it!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 60D = Best Purchase Ever!
Reviews.Author: T and E
Reviews.Content: I bought the Canon EOS 60D with a two lens package (18-55mm and 55-250 telephoto) along with a few accessories, a memory stick, camera bag, tripod, etc. First, I absolutely LOVE my camera. It arrived ahead of schedule, everything was included like it said, the camera was obviously brand new, and with TWO lenses...the price was perfection. My only complaints, however, revolve around the quality of the "extra stuff." My camera bag buckle has already snapped, the tripod is really super cheap, and the included memory stick is too slow for the speed at which I shoot. Nevertheless, the price was/is so great that it doesn't matter because I saved so much for the camera and lenses that the other stuff doesn't even matter. It's a great starter kick, and when considering the price I can still afford the bag I want, and I already own a great tripod. If you're looking for an EOS 60D...this was the best deal ever!

Reviews.Title: NBC, eat your heart out.
Reviews.Author: Tommy Jordan
Reviews.Content: The Camera Body:I'm in LOVE with this camera. The HD video clarity is stunning! I've got footage from ABC and NBC B-roll stored here on my PC from their interviews and when you play their side-by-side with my footage.. it's just as compelling and just as vivid and clear. I love it! Their cameras cost around 50 thousand. Mine didn't!The photo capabilities for still-shots are just as powerful, much more so than I've yet to master. It's going to take me a long time and a lot of studying to get fully away from the "auto" features, but I'm trying. Things like aperture priority and shutter priority take time to get used you. If you set A to auto, then you have to manually configure B and C. If you set B to auto, you have to manually configure A and C, or you can manually configure A, B, C as well as zoom and focus...It's a lot to master in the professional mode, but if you're just looking for amazingly-awesome clarity, it shoots AWESOME in the auto-modes as well. It's easy enough to use that my wife and kids love taking photos with it just for fun. The "action" mode is capable of shooting until the memory fills up. I haven't tried to see how many photos that actually is yet, but it's more than I've needed for anything. Just press and hold the shutter and click-click-click-click, rapid fire until you release it.I can't say enough positive things about this camera.Camera Bag:I read reviews stating the camera bag was crap. I disagree whole-heartedly. No, it's not GREAT for a professional photographer, because it isn't big enough, but it's got enough storage for the beginning amateur, is well crafted, and nicely padded. I'm happy with it.Tripod: The tripod is OK for your small point-and-shoot cameras, but I would NEVER put a heavy-bodied Canon with a 200mm lens attached on it. It's too flimsy. Having said that, I just sold the tripod online to get a few bucks back.It includes a 16gb SDHC card, which was very nice of them. Set on the camera's maxiumum quality JPG setting, each photos is between 6-11mb in size, depending on your setting at the time. That's plenty of space for hundreds of stills and a good amount of video.I didn't realize it at the time but it comes with a spare battery, so you get two batteries as well as a wall/mobile charger. Very nice there too!Overall I couldn't be more impressed at the cost savings. I priced this camera and the parts separately and there was no way I could beat the package pricing offered here. I'll DEFINITELY buy from these guys again. Their customer service was unparalleled on Amazon. Thanks so much for a great product at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny!!!
Reviews.Author: Acme70
Reviews.Content: I am a semi-professioanl, "semi" only because I can't pay all my bills with my photography business....yet, and bought this camera kit as both a upgrade and to try out Canon, I have been shooting Nikon for the last several years. The quality of the camera is superb, and the lenses are good starter lenses. All of the "extras" you get with it are nice to have but I did find their quality to be much lower than the camera itself, but they are nice to have. I would recomend the camera kit to anyone who needs everything all at once, but would recomend upgrading all of the "extras" when you have a chance.

Reviews.Title: Love IT!
Reviews.Author: Jessie
Reviews.Content: First off, Shipping was excellent! Came in 1 day early.1. Camera - On its original box, Brand NEW!2. Lenses - Both lenses in a box, one on a canon packaging and the other is white box which i believe its an original packaging for bundles, they are well packed.3. SD Memory Card is class 10, though its not a known brand but it works.4. Tripod - hmmmm, give it to your kids to play with, dont trust it. If you can buy $1000 worth of a camera, you can affort $150 more for a dependable tripod.5. Case - Zeiko's, its alright but i would suggest you to invest couple of bucks for a better one.6. also included, Zieko's lens tools, Zeiko's Mini Tripod, Zeiko's LCD scratch protectors (3), Extra Battery LP-6E, HDMI Cable, Zieko's Memory Card Reader and Wallet.Packaging was tight and strong. I am loving my camera and Im learning how to use it fast.On the picture was i think a book or a CD entitle "Guide to SLR Camera" - Thats not included. Thats fine, you can find tons of howtos and tutorials on line.5 Stars on Camera5 Stars on SellerThank you;ADDON: i found a use of the cheap tripod, I use it to hold water container for taking water drops. It works good!

Reviews.Title: Quality!
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Ordered it as my first SLR camera. Not only did it get here in 3 days the quality of everything was amazing. The bag seperators I had to readjust to get both lens (with hoods attached) and camera in tho as a starter bag it it perfect.Camera....WHAT THE?? Amazing quality! Was abit worried, tho Canon did well with this bad boy! LCD screen is tight! Meaning built great. Im anal when it comes to my things and between the look/feel it fits erfectly. Everything else in the kit (haha including lens) is above par. Id rate this 10 stars if possible.Tripod is abit lame...(works like a  tripod) tho eventually ima upgrade toan even bigger one. Tho this one isnt bad if you do not have one. Thanks guys!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: It arrived in 3 days of being shipped, 7 days earlier than it said it would be here.  The box said "18-200mm IS Kit" which is wasn't but that's not really important.  Everything was brand new and working fine.  The card although was a class 2, seems to be hit and miss because another review said class 6.  Overall it's a good kit and well worth the deal!  I would recommend this kit to anyone looking to move up from a Rebel series or just beginning with DSLR photography or film making.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: J.R.
Reviews.Content: This package was exceptional! It had more to it than I had thought, and everything was delivered promptly. My only complaint was that the SD reader seems to not work with my computer, but I am not sure it was thier fault. I would highly recomend this for anyone wanting a really good deal on a great camera. The camera body alone would cost as much as this kit in stores like best buy and you get so much more! *****

Reviews.Title: Was in love, now disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Ashley Joy
Reviews.Content: I was completely in love with this package deal and had bought it in June. I received it fairly quickly and was super excited. Everything I got works wonderfully but now that I look back at this deal, I realize I didn't receive 2 lens, more than 1 sd card and no filters. I guess its my fault that I didn't review my packing slip better... But now I'm severely disappointed. Although, they did send a generic EOS Rebel battery as my extra battery, I emailed them that it was the wrong battery and they promptly send me the right battery and told me to keep the Rebel battery as well. That worked out because I also own that camera. If you buy this bundle, you won't be disappointed with what you get, IF you get what you are suppose to. But I don't think they'll have a problem sending you the rest if you complain quick enough...

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Bob in Texas
Reviews.Content: Still learning to use it but I have taken some fantastic pictures so far!  Some of the best yet were for my daughter's senior pictures!  This is a good pro camera at an amateur price!  Oh, it does really nice HD video as well!

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal Starter Pack
Reviews.Author: Technology Jack
Reviews.Content: Short and sweet:Product shipped with in a reasonable time frame, arrived quicker then expected.Product arrived with each item as advertised and to the expectation set in the description.No damages, no defects, no mess, no problems.I would love to do business with this seller again and highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great kit
Reviews.Author: phoenix
Reviews.Content: Great kit for all grade of photographers.All items are cool and very useful as they described.Nice choice of lenses.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Ana
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great quality! Everything is new and original. Just a little disappointed with the tripe, but it is excellent for this price.

Reviews.Title: Super Great Deal
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: I got what I needed and the Camera is Fantastic. Why pay more and get nothing better when you can get it for less here and save lots of money.

Reviews.Title: Just Blown Away
Reviews.Author: Phillip K.
Reviews.Content: After having a Canon Rebel that was over 12 years old, we decided to upgrade. WOW! Some kind of awesome Difference! Pictures are like so amazingly crisp, clear, and the colors are so very vibrant! Just cannot say how thrilled we are to have the new 60D. Amazon seller was great, shipped quick and all pieces were included just as listing said. Thanks for a great ransaction and a awesome product at 30% less than the local stores!

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Hector
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera it works awesome! The pictures come out amazing! Thanks for the discount & great value

Reviews.Title: Great value, 3rd 60D purchase
Reviews.Author: C. Duke
Reviews.Content: I considered getting one of the other 60D body + kit lens options, but for a few bucks more I ordered this kit which came with two lenses and a whole lot more.This is my 3rd 60D purchase, so I won't speak on behalf of how awesome this camera is, rather touch on a few of the accessories included in this kit. The camera is brand new, un-opened, and not a knock-off.The lenses are cheap--and the 18-55 lens is the bottom of the barrel as far as Canon lenses are concerned. Slow focus, loud, and not 'fast' but it does the job in most situations. I like that Canon's low end lenses all have IS now--great for video.Getting an extra battery, 16GB card, lens and card reader are nice additions. The rest of the items (bag, tripod, etc.) are cheap and throw-aways (or something for the kids to play with).There is a book featured in the Amazon photo ("Guide to Digital SLR Cameras") which didn't arrive with the kit, but I didn't want it anyway :)If you're starting out and want a great kit with a lot of accessories you may or may not need, this is a great deal and I'd do it again!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Average kit.
Reviews.Author: SND
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and original. We received our package in a week's time and packaging was good too. But the only concern was even though we received all the items promised by the dealer, the camera was not in its original box. It was taken out from its box and individually wrapped. Here comes the most important thing.. the kit which u see here like tripod, bag etc etc...is not at all very good...its of average quality. Very soon you might have to invest in some good bag, tripod, card etc. The 16gb card we received was class 10. Overall good deal for the camera, rest all things in the kit wont matter.

Reviews.Title: Okay Bundle
Reviews.Author: T. Brock
Reviews.Content: Did not get the jumpstart guide in my order. The tripod is not fullsize. The SD card reader did not work.Most of the accessories are crap but you still end up getting the telephoto lense, SD card and extra battery for free with this bundle.My SD card was class 10.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product, Super transaction!!
Reviews.Author: Amit Kapoor
Reviews.Content: After doing a lot of research across Nikkon and Canon, I finalised Canon 60D. Without doubt it was the best decision for my needs; and this transaction has been one of my best purchases ever!

Reviews.Title: The kit had it all for a beginner!
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo Landaeta
Reviews.Content: It was a great value to purchase everything in such a nice form factor... Everything was sent to me about two years ago and I love my camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Jolyn
Reviews.Content: I received the camera in a timely manner and now that I have it I wish I would have got a dslr so much sooner. Im an amatuer picture taker, but my pictures were immediately better. The clarity of the pictures with this camera is amazing!! Next step is a bigger variety of lenses...

Reviews.Title: Excellent photos
Reviews.Author: Jojo4
Reviews.Content: Great product, even on automatic settings, the pictures are just fabulous.  Considering taking a class to learn more of the manual settings, but really pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 60D Digital SLR Camera and Deluxe Accessory Kit
Reviews.Author: Marion Rogers
Reviews.Content: I have only used my new Canon EOS once this past weekend and that was just to make sure I was doing it right.  I can honestly rate this camera 10 stars because I have other Canons and this one is going to accompany me wherever I go and I plan on going a lot in the next few years.  I have a Bucket List and the places I plan on visiting will be remembered because of this fabulous camera.Not only one of the best cameras made, it was at a great price which included a Deluxe Accessory Kit.  Deluxe is right.  Thanks Amazon.  I also rate Amazon the best company to deal with, quality-wise and especially customer-wise.

Reviews.Title: Great Product Vendor so so...
Reviews.Author: Dave Krienke
Reviews.Content: The Camera and lenses are great and working wonderfully.  The vendor stated the purchase would ship by a certain date and two days past the stated ship date it had not shipped.  I had to call the vendor and they apologized and expedited the shipment so it still arrived on the same day as stated.  I did not have to pay for the expedited shipment.  Still I should not have had to call them to find out why it had not shipped on time.  I wonder how long it would have really taken had I not called.  I have been taking some great amazing photos with the camera.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son who is a Communications  Graduate Major. His professors said for a middle professional camera it shoots video better than some 15000.00 camera's they have at their college. My son has shot video for projects at school and it is safe to say he loves this camera. While this review is not a technical one it is nice to know all the Profs have this camera too.

Reviews.Title: My canod 60d
Reviews.Author: Joseph angelo
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and I receive my package on time and safe. I will recommend this camera to all my friends. Awesome deal...

Reviews.Title: Ohio
Reviews.Author: Tamim
Reviews.Content: I'm not happyPurchasing poor qualityIt's not goodBag was cut off because of the PoorWill not buy from you again because of lack of product quality

Reviews.Title: Complete satisfaction
Reviews.Author: kay56
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer and so far have thoroughly enjoyed learning to use the Canon EOS 60D.  It takes awesome pictures and I am having fun learning all of it's capabilities.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD - Body (Includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS SLR Lens - Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens - 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E6 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! Mini HDMI to standard
HDMI cable direct connection to a high-definition TV monitor - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens & EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens + Deluxe Accessory Kit
